title: How does one know they are a psychic or are becoming one? How did you know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Flee from this go to Jesus, you are being possessed by demons!, They will drag you to hell friend, Just say a prayer to Jesus from your heart and run to him. fast and obey his word and ask for the Holy Spirit. Flee from this evil confess your wrong doings to the Lord, if you can believe in psychics (which are lying spirits - demons) You can believe in Jesus. Get on your knees, cry out to him to save you from witchcraft, Revelation 21:8 But as for the cowardly, the faithless, the detestable, as for murderers, the sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their portion will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death.” Leviticus 20:6 “If a person turns to mediums and necromancers, whoring after them, I will set my face against that person and will cut him off from among his people. 2 Chronicles 33:6 And he burned his sons as an offering in the Valley of the Son of Hinnom, and used fortune-telling and omens and sorcery, and dealt with mediums and with necromancers. He did much evil in the sight of the Lord, provoking him to anger. Seek the Lord while you still can. And watch this.

It begins with ignorance and a vivid imagination, and can progress to a full-blown delusion. Greed may or may not be involved, depending on whether you intend to use your lie to con vulnerable and grieving people out of their money, and give them false hope. Which is despicable. For people who just make it known among family and friends that they are 'psychic' - seeing signs of dead relatives around the house etc. - they just like the attention (making a fuss over their correct guesses and ignoring the majority of wrong & unprovable ones), and will usually be completely ignorant of things like coincidence or statistics. Because it's all rubbish.
How does one know they are a psychic or are becoming one? You can’t because no one is. How did you know? Lack of evidence.
